Psychological Definition: Cognitive needs relate to the desire for knowledge, understanding, and mental stimulation.

Workplace Definition: Cognitive needs in the workplace encompass opportunities for learning, training programs, and intellectual challenges within job roles.

Leadership Support:
  • Provide access to continuous learning and development programs.
  • Encourage employees to attend workshops and conferences.
  • Assign intellectually stimulating tasks and projects.
  • Support a culture of innovation and creativity.
